main event: A 10-year-old boy observed a UFO that changed colors and moved in an unusual manner while in Spotswood, New Jersey in March 1967.
interesting points: The object was first white, then turned red and appeared to descend before ascending straight up.,The observation lasted for 30 minutes.,The witness is a youth who has a club with friends that discusses UFOs.,The witness reported the sighting to his parents on March 7, 1967.,The object was estimated to move at about 60 miles per hour.
sighted object: a single object that changed colors and moved unusually
